ing: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle chilled Riesling (or preferred white wine)
des: "A refreshing drink to cool you down on those hot summer nights. Works well with any white wine; I prefer Riesling."
ins: Stir Riesling, peach schnapps, and pineapple juice together in a pitcher; add frozen peach slices and lime wedges to serve.
